loc2.description: Pass a Luck(+0) check or stumble into a spider"s web. Lose 2 Sanity and stay here next turn while struggling to get free.
loc2.name: The Dreamlands

loc1.description: A horrible visage captures your gaze. Pass a Will(+0) check to look away or lose 1 Stamina and stay here next turn.
loc1.name: R"lyeh

other.description: Suddenly, the things you"ve seen make sense! Gain 1 Clue token.
